org.sql: SELECT podcast_episodes.* FROM podcast_episodes INNER JOIN podcasts ON podcasts.id = podcast_episodes.podcast_id WHERE podcast_episodes.podcast_id = "$1" AND podcast_episodes.reachable = "$2" AND podcasts.published = "$3" AND podcast_episodes.slug = "$4" LIMIT "$5"

rewrites.sql: SELECT podcast_episodes.* FROM podcast_episodes WHERE podcast_episodes.podcast_id = "$1" AND podcast_episodes.reachable = "$2" AND podcast_episodes.slug = "$4" LIMIT "$5"
